title: Practical Exam And Teammate (Part 1)
body:
Practical Exam And Teammate (Part 1)

A Few days passed by since Evan returned to the academy.

He gave black liquid and the phone of Carlos to Valery.

When he gave Carlos's phone and the black liquid he didn't forget to remind her, about the cores.

During these days Evan stayed in the academy and didn't go out.

The reason he didn't go out was because he wanted to relax a bit and the month was about to end.

Previously Elena told him that the practical exam will be held next month. And since the month was about to end he stayed in the academy.

He attend the classes at the academy and enjoyed these few days.

Today was the last day of the month, and Evan attend the class just like before. But after the class ended Elena stopped all the students from leaving.

Everyone knew the practical exams are coming, so they were quite excited when Elena stopped them after the class ended.

Seeing everyone were looking at her curiously Elena smiled and nodded her head,
